entry.title: U.N. Nuclear Watchdog Alarmed by Shelling Near Ukraine's Zaporizhzhia Plant
entry.content: The head of the United Nations atomic agency said shelling near Europeâ€™s largest nuclear power station underlined the risk of a disaster that would threaten public health far beyond the battlefield.

entry.title: Beijing Simulates Attack on Taiwan as Chinese Exercises Extend Into Third Day
entry.content: Chinese military aircraft and ships crossed the halfway mark of the Taiwan Strait, in a simulated land strike on the self-governing island that Beijing claims as its own.
